ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Shipment_Status_Mon__c,"Finished"), ISNULL(Equip_Placed__c)|| ISNULL(Equip_Loaded__c)|| ISNULL(Departure_Time__c)|| ISNULL(Equip_Reserved__c)|| ISNULL(Equip_Solicited__c)|| ISNULL(Equip_Unloaded__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: NO puede ser "Finalizado" sin completar la seccion ROUTE & SCHEDULE
